Subject: Vendor Questions
Description:
KIndly provide answers to these questions.

1. does the Third Party and/or Subcontractor develop or provide a Model or Artificial Intelligence (including products which integrate, leverage or consume data created/generated through the use of Artificial Intelligence) to Bank of America?
a.Develops model
b.Provides data for model
c.No

2.Please select the countries where the Third Party and/or Subcontractor is performing and/or delivering product(s) or service(s) for Bank of America.  We only work with a US-based Netwrix support team. 

3.Does the product(s) or service(s) provided require/allow the Third Party and/or Subcontractor to have access to, process, store, transmit or transport Bank of America data? 

4.Does the Third Party and/or Subcontractor develop or customize software application(s) specifically for Bank of America? No

5.Does the relationship with the Third Party involve an application(s) that Bank of America builds, buys, or uses to enable a business process? If yes, select the role of the Third Party in the delivery of the application.
a.Host
b.Support or Manage
c.Develop
d.Provide for use ----
e.No
